sandy.core.data.Plane

type
class
version
3.1
since
0.1
A plane in 3D space.

This class is used primarily to represent the frustrum planes of the camera.

Constructor

new()
parameters
p_nA the first plane coordinate
p_nB the second plane coordinate
p_nC the third plane coordinate
p_nd the forth plane coordinate
Creates a new Plane instance.

Returns a string represntation of this plane.
